short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A mini game for even long loading screens, longer code deploy wait times, or the 5.1 minutes between meetings!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you have 3 minutes to spare and nothing to do until your next meeting?

Did you finish an in-class project early and have 3 minutes till the class reconvenes?

Is artificial intelligence taking forever to answer your question?

The solution to your boredom is Cow Hunt!

Cow Hunt is a free-to-play Chrome extension mini-game designed to make those menial minutes worthwhile! 

Download now and make the most out of those short breaks!
